1: <pb/><t>¡Ri Ajawaxel ajawinel!</t> <t>¡Ri Ajawaxel xratz'iakij rib</t> <t>ruc' juluwem,</t> <t>xukuje' u sutim rij ruc' cuinem!</t> <t>Are' xjekeban ri uwächulew</t> <t>rech man cäslab taj.</t>
2: <t>Ri tem la re ajawibal co jekelic</t> <t>ojer petinak ulok,</t> <t>Ajawaxel.</t> <t>¡Ri lal, ojer ulok lal c'olic!</t>
3: <pb/><t>Oh Ajawaxel, ri nima' quejininic,</t> <t>quequiwalijisaj nimak tak rekbala';</t>
4: <t>are c'u ri lal,</t> <t>Ajawaxel, pa ri chicaj,</t> <t>c'o na ri cuinem la</t> <t>chuwäch ri rekbala',</t> <t>xukuje' chuwäch ri u jininem ri plo.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Oh Ajawaxel,</t> <t>ri e takomal la co e jekelic.</t> <t>¡Ri tastaliquil are wikbal junalic</t> <t>chupam ri achoch la!</t>
